title: Gorod Zero AKA City Zero(1988,CCCP) 720x544
description:
City Zero

Genre: phantasmagoria, tragicomedy, grotesque
Year: 1988
Duration: 1:37:03

Directed by Karen Shakhnazarov

Cast: Leonid Filatov, Oleg Basilashvili, Vladimir Menchov, Jigarkhanyan, Eugene Yevstigneev, Alexei Zharkov, Pyotr Shcherbakov, Yuri Sherstnev, Arzhanik Elena, Tatiana Khvostikov

Description: Simple Soviet engineer Varakin travels from Moscow on a business trip to a small town. He has to decide with the director of the local plant a question about some deliveries. Plain, even boring business trip. However, the moment the director of the plant Varakina suddenly it turns out that in this city as a hero would fall out of a plane. For example, the plant manager's secretary sitting at the typewriter completely naked. Well, that is all. But the problem is not that she is naked, but the fact that it is normal. And no one in her nakedness do not pay attention ...

Extras. Information:
Screenplay: Alexander Borodyansky, Karen Shakhnazarov
Operator: Nicholas Nemolyaev
Artist: Lyudmila Kusakov
Composer: Eduard Artemyev
Awards: "Golden Hugo" at the International Film Festival in Chicago (1989), "Silver Spike" at the International Film Festival of Valladolid (1989), Prize of the European Association for the best science fiction film at the International Film Festival in San Marino (1989), the prize "For the creation the ensemble cast, "prize" for the film, which became a holiday "on KF" Constellation "(1989)
Parental control: for any audience
